// @flow
// BASEUI-GENERATED-REACT-ICON
// DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE DIRECTLY, SEE README.md
import * as React from 'react';
import {useStyletron} from '../styles/index.js';
import {mergeOverride, toObjectOverride} from '../helpers/overrides.js';

import Icon from './icon.js';
import type {IconPropsT} from './types.js';

function %%ICON_NAME%%(props: IconPropsT, ref) {
  const [, theme] = useStyletron();
  const {title = '%%SVG_TITLE%%', size, color, overrides = {},...restProps} = props;
  const SvgOverride = mergeOverride(
    // Icons from the theme target the SVG override in the underlying Icon component
    {
      component:
        theme.icons && theme.icons.%%ICON_NAME%% ? theme.icons.%%ICON_NAME%% : null,
    },
    overrides && overrides.Svg ? toObjectOverride(overrides.Svg) : {},
  );
  return (
    <Icon
      %%SVG_VIEWBOX%%
      ref={ref}
      title={title}
      size={size}
      color={color}
      overrides={{Svg: SvgOverride}}
      {...restProps}
    >
      %%ICON_PATH%%
    </Icon>
  );
}

export default React.forwardRef<IconPropsT, mixed>(%%ICON_NAME%%);
